column4: Can anyone please help, when I try to suspend on my computer it looks like it is working fine, but when I try to wake it up I have a blank screen. I don't think my monitor is waking up
what video card do you have?
Intel GMA 900 Integrated Graphics with 128MB Shared Memory and the driver is i810. Someone told me to switch to the vesa driver but it didn't work either
google your laptop model and see if there are any issues with acpi
